articles.title: Twitch starts testing vertical video streams - TechCrunch
articles.summary: Twitch starts testing vertical video streams Livestreaming service Twitch, which is owned by Amazon, announced at its annual TwitchCon event earlier this year that it would move into the vertical video space. Now those initial alpha tests have gone live with a few streamers, according to findings from market intelligence provider AppSensa. In a recent build, the firm found references...
